items.data: Welcome to the documentation for ngx-primer. This library provides a set of primitive components for Angular applications, designed to help you build consistent and high-quality user interfaces with ease.

ngx-primer is a library of Angular components that follow the Primer design system. It provides a set of reusable, customizable, and accessible UI components that help you build consistent and high-quality user interfaces.

data: Ensure design consistency across your application
Speed up development with ready-to-use components
Improve accessibility with built-in best practices
Customize components to fit your needs

items.data: To get started with ngx-primer, check out the Getting Started guide in the documentation.
